name: Fragments (itch) (Pyriceti, jeremy-ha, Antonder, Lara Ploix)
description:
Errors of the past are heavy to bear for Lauren. In her mind palace, fragments of memories lie, and all converge to her brother, Tommy. Help her in the road for forgiveness throughout three islets of her life.

Controls

  • Mouse to look around
  • Left click to interact with items (you may take-release most of the items too)
  • ZQSD to move
  • Esc to quit

Credits

  • Anthony DE RUEDA : storytelling, environment art/technical art
  • Jeremy HA : storytelling, game design, programmation
  • Baptiste PERRAUD : storytelling, composition, sound design
  • Lara PLOIX : storytelling, art direction, character design
